traits.Hold Breath: The lizardfolk can hold its breath for 15 minutes.

actions.Multiattack: The lizardfolk makes two melee attacks, each one with a different weapon.
actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +4+1d4 + 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.Heavy Club: Melee Weapon Attack: +4+1d4 + 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.
actions.Javelin: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4+1d4 + 2 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.Spiked Shield: Melee Weapon Attack: +4+1d4 + 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.
